parts.speaker: Grace
parts.text: How are you doing son? You seem tired, are you sure your job isn't taking a toll on you? You know you can leave at any time.

options.text: I have a high responsibility in a respected newspaper, I don't have a choice.
I love my job, don't worry about it.

parts.speaker: Grace
parts.text: You always have a choice, money and work aren't everything in life!

parts.speaker: Grace
parts.text: Are you sure? I don't think you're being completely honest with me.

parts.speaker: Grace
parts.text: Of course it does! I'm worried about your health, and about the risk you've taken by accepting this job. Who knows what might happen if someone chooses to retaliate over something you published?
